Welcome to Click or Trick!

This game is designed to test your skills of detecting spam emails, messages or phone call.

Before you being the rules of this game are as follows.

1. You will be presented with a series of emails, messages, or phone call scenarios.

2. For each scenario, you must decide whether it is legitimate (Click) or a scam (Trick).

3. You will earn points for each correct identification and lose points for incorrect ones.

4. Try to score as high as possible and improve your ability to spot scams!
